post.content:
Well it has been exactly one month since you posted your inquiry.

Let me give you my answer and opinion...

1. The Job market is still very depressing.

2. The school you are asking about is unknown to me.

3. To find a job, you could contact agencies. However, they do
   not pay much attention to new comers like yourself because of
   communication problem. Also they want candidate who has Canadian
   experience.
   You could contact companies directly, but this is not an efficient
   approach because they are constantly bombarded with resumes
   of good candidates from agencies.
   Also you could use job posting in Newspaper or Manpower, but
   I rarely see any advertisement these days except some
   management position.
   You could also use Web Sites (see on Home page of COSKA.COM),
   and this is mostly recommended,
   however, remember there are so many people applying for it.
   So the chance of getting an interview is slim unless
   you have a skill in demand.

4. It is very unfortunate that the current job market in IT
   is very bad overall, not like few years ago.

   You might even have to take any job to survive in the mean time.
   According to the statistics, there are still high percentage of
   unemployment among Canadian .

I wish you all the Best and good luck.

BTW, it is my personal opinion, and I hope it is some help to you.

Thanks.

SK
